title: [K-12] Instructional Design Based on Formative Assessment of Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information literacy skills and understanding of educational environments
context.additional_context: A process for enhancing information evaluation competencies required in actual educational settings, targeting learner groups composed of pre-service/in-service teachers. Implementation of formative assessment based on worksheets within an LMS and integration with learner feedback systems

learning_goals: Learners can systematically derive keywords, synonyms, and related terms for a given educational topic.
Learners can select appropriate information from academic databases based on derived search terms.
Learners can analyze and correct logical flaws in the information selection process through peer assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
